datafield.subfield: Measurement of CP observables in $B^0 \to D K^{*0}$ with $D \to K^+ K^-$
Measurement of the forward energy flow in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=7$ TeV
Measurement of the cross-section for $Z \to e^+e^-$ production in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=7$ TeV
Measurement of $J/\psi$ production in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=2.76$ TeV
Measurement of the time-dependent $CP$ asymmetry in $B^0 \to J/\psi K^0_{\rm S}$ decays
First observation of the decay $B_{s2}^*(5840)^0 \to B^{*+} K^-$ and studies of excited $B^0_s$ mesons
First observation of the decays $\bar{B}^0_{(s)}\to D_s^+K^-\pi^+\pi^-$ and $\bar{B}^0_s\to D_{s1}(2536)^+\pi^-$
Measurement of the $B^0$--$\bar B^0$ oscillation frequency $\Delta m_d$ with the decays $B^0 \to D^- \pi^+$ and $B^0 \to J\ \psi K^{*0}$
A study of the $Z$ production cross-section in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s} = 7$ TeV using tau final states
Measurement of the $C\!P$ asymmetry in $B^0 \to K^{*0} \mu^+ \mu^-$ decays
Measurement of the D+/- production asymmetry in 7 TeV pp collisions
Evidence for the decay $B^0\to J/\psi \omega$ and measurement of the relative branching fractions of $B^0_s$ meson decays to $J/\psi\eta$ and $J/\psi\eta^{'}$
First evidence for the annihilation decay mode $B^{+} \to D_{s}^{+} \phi$
A model-independent Dalitz plot analysis of $B^\pm \to D K^\pm$ with $D \to K^0_{\rm S} h^+h^-$ ($h=\pi, K$) decays and constraints on the CKM angle $\gamma$
Measurements of $B_c^+$ production and mass with the $B_c^+ \to J/\psi \pi^+$ decay
Differential branching fraction and angular analysis of the $B^{+} \rightarrow K^{+}\mu^{+}\mu^{-}$ decay
Measurement of the ratio of branching fractions $BR(B_0 \to K^{\star 0} \gamma)/BR(B_{s0} \to \phi \gamma)$ and the direct CP asymmetry in $B_0 \to K^{\star 0} \gamma$
Measurement of the fraction of $\Upsilon(1S)$ originating from $\chi_b(1P)$ decays in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s} = 7$ TeV
Implications of LHCb measurements and future prospects
Measurement of the $B^0_s \rightarrow J/\psi \bar{K}^{*0}$ branching fraction and angular amplitudes
Study of $D_{sJ}$ decays to $D^+K^0_S$ and $D^0K^+$ final states in $pp$ collisions
Measurement of the effective $B_s^0 \rightarrow K^+ K^-$ lifetime
Observation of $B^0 \to \bar{D}^0 K^+ K^-$ and evidence of $B^0_s \to \bar{D}^0 K^+ K^-$
Measurement of the $B_s$ effective lifetime in the $J/\psi f_0(980)$ final state
Measurement of prompt hadron production ratios in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s} = $ 0.9 and 7 TeV
Measurement of $b$-hadron branching fractions for two-body decays into charmless charged hadrons
Measurement of the isospin asymmetry in $B \to K^{(*)}\mu^+\mu^-$ decays
Observation of double charm production involving open charm in pp collisions at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV
Measurement of the $B_s^0\to J/\psi K_S^0$ branching fraction
Measurement of relative branching fractions of B decays to $\psi(2S)$ and $J/\psi$ mesons
Measurement of the $D_s^+ - D_s^-$ production asymmetry in 7 TeV $pp$ collisions
Framework TDR for the LHCb Upgrade
Measurement of the CP-violating phase $\phi_s$ in $\overline{B}^0_s \to J/\psi\pi^+\pi^-$ decays
Analysis of the resonant components in $B_s \to J/\psi\pi^+\pi^-$
Measurement of the polarization amplitudes and triple product asymmetries in the $B_s^0 \to \phi\phi$ decay
Inclusive $W$ and $Z$ production in the forward region at $\sqrt{s} = 7$ TeV
Measurement of the ratio of prompt $\chi_{c}$ to $J/\psi$ production in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=7$ TeV
Measurement of $\psi(2S)$ meson production in pp collisions at $\sqrt{s}$=7 TeV
Measurements of the branching fractions of the decays $B^{0}_{s} \to D^{\mp}_{s} K^{\pm} $ and $B^{0}_{s} \to D^{-}_{s} \pi^{+}$
First observation of the decay $B_c^+ \to J/\psi \pi^+\pi^-\pi^+$
Strong constraints on the rare decays $B_s \to \mu^+ \mu^-$ and $B^0 \to \mu^+ \mu^-$
Observation of CP violation in $B^\pm \to DK^\pm$ decays
Measurements of the branching fractions and $C\!P$ asymmetries of $B^{\pm} \to J\!/\!\psi\, \pi^{\pm}$ and $B^{\pm} \to \psi(2S) \pi^{\pm}$ decays
Measurement of Upsilon production in pp collisions at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV
Measurement of the ratio of branching fractions $\mathcal{B}(B^0\to K^{*0}\gamma)/\mathcal{B}(B_s^0\to\phi\gamma)$
First evidence of direct $C\!P$ violation in charmless two-body decays of $B^0_s$ mesons
Search for the $X(4140)$ state in $B^+ \to J/\psi \phi K^+$ decays
Opposite-side flavour tagging of B mesons at the LHCb experiment
Measurement of the $B^\pm$ production cross-section in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=7$ TeV
Determination of the sign of the decay width difference in the $B_s$ system
Measurement of the cross-section ratio $\sigma(\chi_{c2})/\sigma(\chi_{c1})$ for prompt $\chi_c$ production at $\sqrt{s}=7$ TeV
Searches for Majorana neutrinos in $B^-$ decays
First observation of the decays $\bar{B}^0 \to D^{+} K^{-} \pi^{+} \pi^{-}$ and $B^{-} \to D^0 K^{-} \pi^{+} \pi^{-}$
